CustomObject.description: Custom metadata storing reusable validation rules for Requirement_Field__c fields, enabling configuration-driven validation without code deployments. Rules support format validation, cross-field validation, and external validation via Validation Rule Builder UI. Example: A validation rule with DeveloperName="Insurance_Policy_Number_Format" might validate that a policy number field matches a 10-digit format (regex: ^[0-9]{10}$). Another rule might enforce cross-field validation ensuring Policy_Expiry_Date__c is after Policy_Start_Date__c. When users enter values in Requirement_Field_Value__c records, these rules are automatically evaluated, and failures create Validation_Failure__c records. Rules can be activated/deactivated and modified via metadata without deploying code, providing flexibility for business users.
CustomObject.label: Requirement Field Validation Rule
